p: The sequence analysis of replication-defective RSV29, believed to be an early passage of the original Rous isolate, suggests that this virus is a direct precursor of the Bryan high-titer strain [ 83]. The conclusion that this also indicates defectiveness of the original isolate is not warranted, as deletion of the env gene could have occurred and could be selected for within the presumably short passage history of RSV29 [ 83].
